original_title: The Do's and Don'ts of Getting Married
overview: True love calls for a wedding and Max and Emma and their friends are winding themselves up into a frenzy over the planning. Everybody has a different vision for the wedding, and no one can agree. Until Sassy diva boss and self-appointed wedding planner, Scarlet takes charge.
tagline: True love calls for a wedding
title: The Do's and Don'ts of Getting Married
